questions.name: template_1
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = 'Breeze'))
NLquestions: How many days with__ Temperature were there in__ ==,== in_2022 ?

questions.name: template_2
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2015')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = 'Breeze') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Storm'))
NLquestions: How many days with__ Temperature or Wind were there in__ ==,== in_2015 ?

questions.name: template_3
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018') OR (Year = '2015') OR (Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Storm'))
NLquestions: How many days with__ Wind were there in__ ==,== in_2018 or 2015 or 2022 ?

questions.name: template_4
questions.sql: SELECT avg(Value) AS avg_Value, sum(Value) AS sum_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018') OR (Year = '2015') OR (Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = '0-10'))
NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Wind in__ ==,== in_2018 or 2015 or 2022 ?

questions.name: template_6
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2015') OR (Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '31-40') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Storm'))
NLquestions: How many days with__ Temperature or Wind were there in__ ==,== in_2015 or 2022 ?

questions.name: template_7
questions.sql: SELECT max(Value) AS max_Value, avg(Value) AS avg_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = '0-10') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = 'Breeze') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Storm'))
NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Wind or Temperature in__ ==,== in_2022 ?

questions.name: template_8
questions.sql: SELECT Year, avg(Value) AS avg_Value, sum(Value) AS sum_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018') OR (Year = '2022')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = '31-40') OR (Characteristic = 'Temperature' AND Intensity = 'Breeze') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind' AND Intensity = 'Storm')) GROUP BY Year
NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Temperature or Wind in__ ==,== in_2018 or 2022 ?

questions.name: template_9
questions.sql: SELECT min(Value) AS min_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind')) GROUP BY Characteristic
NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Temperature or Wind in__ ==,== in_2018 ?

questions.name: template_10
questions.sql: SELECT Characteristic, avg(Value) AS avg_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2015')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind')) GROUP BY Characteristic
NLquestions: What is/are_the_ /numbers_of_days with__ Temperature or Wind in__ ==,== in_2015 ?

questions.name: template_11
questions.sql: SELECT Characteristic, Year, max(Value) AS max_Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018') OR (Year = '2015')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind')) GROUP BY Characteristic, Year

questions.name: template_12
questions.sql: SELECT Value FROM DBdata WHERE ((Year = '2018')) AND ((Characteristic = 'Temperature') OR (Characteristic = 'Wind')) ORDER BY Value ASC LIMIT 3
NLquestions: What are the largest/smallest_ numbers_of_days with__ Temperature or Wind in__ ==,== in_2018 ?

questions.name: template_13
